# DB Goto Row
<!--
@name: DB Goto Row
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Moves the seeker to the number of row.
## Parameters

- _Id&dollar;_ (optional): ID of the results of the query.
- **row**: Index of the row
---
